repository.corpname: Columbia University.Rare Book and Manuscript Library,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Letters to Kenton from outstanding literary figures such as Theodore Dreiser, Carl Van Vechten, Charles Hanson Towne, George Cram Cook, Henry L. Mencken, Richard Watson Gilder, Witter Bynner. The correspondence is partly personal, and part relates to the Provincetown Players, but chiefly the letters are from editors of various magazines including DELINEATOR and SMART SET, to which Kenton contributed stories.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Material is arranged into one series: Series I: Edna Kenton Correspondence, 1903-1954.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of specific item; Date (if known); Edna Kenton Correspondence; Box and Folder; Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Columbia University Library.
